remarks: The identity functor for a subcategory is an "inclusion functor" from the subcategory into its supercategory.  (Contributed by AV, 29-Mar-2020.)
statement:
idfusubc.s $e |- S = ( C |`cat J ) $.
idfusubc.i $e |- I = ( idFunc ` S ) $.
idfusubc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
idfusubc0 $p |- ( J e. ( Subcat ` C ) -> I = <. ( _I |` B ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( _I |` ( x ( Hom ` S ) y ) ) ) >. ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d S x y $.
